author: tokey1475
content: Are there really economic incentives for proposers to steal MEV or only to steal funds from the front running tx in a sandwich?  Given the increase in re-orgs we are seeing and possibility of other attack vectors still existing, I'm wondering if we would be better off not trying to prevent this attack at all and rather putting the onus on builders/searchers to protect themselves from these sorts of attacks (with the added benefit of disincentivizing sandwiches).

author: tokey1475
content: Or is the concern that if MEV-Boost can't safely support sandwhich MEV that even that will be enough to drive back-channels leading to unacceptable centralization?
